SEARCH
Module dev.riko.golftourplanner
Package dev.riko.golftourplanner.controlers

Class WorldFXMLController

java.lang.Object
dev.riko.golftourplanner.controlers.WorldFXMLController
public class WorldFXMLController extends Object
The WorldFXMLController class is the controller class for the WorldFXML.fxml file. This class is responsible for managing user input and updating the graphical user interface based on that input.

The class contains methods for generating places, showing places on a map, swapping panels, highlighting places on a map, listing places with a facility, filtering places, and showing the shortest path on a map.

Additionally, the class contains a nested NonAllowedInputException class that is thrown when the user inputs an invalid number of places.

  • Constructor Details

    • WorldFXMLController

      public WorldFXMLController()

  • Method Details

    • generatePlaces

      public void generatePlaces(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Generates a specified number of places, sets the generated places in the World class, and updates the graphical user interface to show the generated places on a map, list the generated places, and hide the info label.

      If the user inputs an invalid number of places, an error message is displayed on the graphical user interface.

      Parameters:
      stage - The Stage object representing the graphical user interface window.

    • showPlacesOnMap

      public void showPlacesOnMap(List<Place> placeList)
      Shows a list of places on a map with connections between the places.
      Parameters:
      placeList - The list of places to show on the map.

    • swapPanels

      public void swapPanels()
      Swaps the visibility of the panels to display the places panel and clear the input fields and list of shortest paths.

    • highlightPlaceOnMap

      public void highlightPlaceOnMap(List<Place> filteredPlaces)
      Highlights the first place in the filtered places list on the map by changing its color to red.

      If the search place input field is empty, it shows all the places on the map.

      Parameters:
      filteredPlaces - the list of filtered places

    • listPlacesWithFacility

      public void listPlacesWithFacility(FacilityType facilityType)
      Lists the places with the specified facility type on the places list view, golf tour list view and highlights them on the map by changing their color to green using showPlacesWithFacility(FacilityType) method.
      Parameters:
      facilityType - the facility type to be filtered

    • filterPlaces

      public List<Place> filterPlaces()
      Filters the places by matching the place titles with the characters in the search place input field.

      Updates the places list view with the filtered places and returns the filtered places.

      Returns:
      the list of filtered places

    • showShortestPathOnMap

      public void showShortestPathOnMap(List<Place> shortestPath)
      This method displays the shortest path on the map by marking the places on the map with colors and drawing lines between them.
      Parameters:
      shortestPath - the list of places that are part of the shortest path.

    • showGolfTour

      public void showGolfTour(List<List<Place>> golfTour)
      Shows the given golf tour on the map by displaying the places with golf courses and the shortest path between them.
      Parameters:
      golfTour - A list of lists of Places representing the golf tour, where each inner list

    • closeTourInfoPanel

      public void closeTourInfoPanel()
      Closes the tour information panel and displays the creation tour panel
